properties.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued July 29 at 2:32PM CDT until July 31 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Heat Advisory, heat index values up to 107. For the
Excessive Heat Warning, dangerously hot conditions with heat index
readings around 110 expected and locally higher readings up to 115
possible.

* WHERE...Portions of southern Illinois, western Kentucky, and
southeast Missouri.

* WHEN...For the Heat Advisory, until 8 PM CDT this evening. For the
Excessive Heat Warning, from 11 AM Tuesday to 8 PM CDT Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Heat related illnesses increase significantly during
extreme heat and high humidity events.
properties.instruction:
Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of
the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.

NWSheadline: HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TUESDAY TO 8 PM CDT WEDNESDAY
